trains

Class Trains

  • java.lang.Object
    • trains.Trains

  • public class Trains
extends java.lang.Object
    Main runnable class for running the "Train" simulation -Contains the static main(String[] args)

      static void checkAndStartActivities(java.lang.Thread[] threads, int[] counters, PetriMap map, int[] preMarkings, int[] postMarkings, int[][] preMatrix, java.util.ArrayList<Transition> events)
      Scans the petri network and starts an activity for each place that has a post-marking greater than it's pre-marking -The activity only start if the pre-marking was equal to zero (empty)

      Pushes tokens out of the post-markings list.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main loop for the Trains simulation Creating a .bat file with this content will make the simulation run for 500 ticks and redirect the output to output.txt inside the execution folder: java -jar Trains.jar "greater than symbol" output.txt trains.ArgsTest 500

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main loop for the Trains simulation Creating a .bat file with this content will make the simulation run for 500 ticks and redirect the output to output.txt inside the execution folder: java -jar Trains.jar "greater than symbol" output.txt trains.ArgsTest 500
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments for running this program. args[0] parameter for arguments selection, args[1] the numbers ticks to run this program for

      • initMatrices

        public static void initMatrices(PetriMap map,
                                int[][] preMatrix,
                                int[][] postMatrix)
        Initialises the pre and post matrices
        Parameters:
        map - object based representation of a Petri network
        preMatrix - the matrix that links places to transitions
        postMatrix - the matrix that links transitions to places

      • checkAndStartActivities

        public static void checkAndStartActivities(java.lang.Thread[] threads,
                                           int[] counters,
                                           PetriMap map,
                                           int[] preMarkings,
                                           int[] postMarkings,
                                           int[][] preMatrix,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<Transition> events)
        Scans the petri network and starts an activity for each place that has a post-marking greater than it's pre-marking -The activity only start if the pre-marking was equal to zero (empty)
        Parameters:
        threads - array of threads
        counters - array of counters
        map - object based representation of a Petri network
        preMarkings - number of tokens in each place before the update
        postMarkings - number of tokens in each place after the update
        preMatrix - the matrix that links places to transitions
        events - the events that will be returned by the threads

      • PostMarkingsToPreMarkings

        public static void PostMarkingsToPreMarkings(int[] preMarkings,
                                             int[] postMarkings)
        Copies the post markings into the pre markings
        Parameters:
        preMarkings - number of tokens in each place before the update
        postMarkings - number of tokens in each place after the update

      • PreMarkingsToPostMarkings

        public static void PreMarkingsToPostMarkings(int[] preMarkings,
                                             int[] postMarkings)
        Copies the pre markings into the post markings
        Parameters:
        preMarkings - number of tokens in each place before the update
        postMarkings - number of tokens in each place after the update

      • getSensitizedTransitionsRand

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Transition> getSensitizedTransitionsRand(PetriMap map,
                                                                           int[][] preMatrix,
                                                                           int[] preMarkings)
        Returns a shuffled list of all transitions that are sensitized

        Transition is sensitized if each of it's corresponding places tokens (preMarkings) is greater or equal to the values defined by the preMatrix

        Parameters:
        map - object based representation of a Petri network
        preMatrix - the matrix that links places to transitions
        preMarkings - number of tokens in each place before the update
        Returns:
        a list of sensitized transitions

      • ejectTokensFromPlaces

        public static void ejectTokensFromPlaces(PetriMap map,
                                         Transition transition,
                                         int[][] preMatrix,
                                         int[] preMarkings)
        Pulls tokens out of the pre-markings list. The amount of tokens to eject is defined by the preMatrix
        Parameters:
        map - object based representation of a Petri network
        transition - the transition that will consume tokens
        preMatrix - the matrix that links places to transitions
        preMarkings - number of tokens in each place before the update

      • insertTokensFromTransitions

        public static void insertTokensFromTransitions(PetriMap map,
                                               Transition transition,
                                               int[][] postMatrix,
                                               int[] postMarkings)
        Pushes tokens out of the post-markings list. The amount of tokens to eject is defined by the postMatrix
        Parameters:
        map - object based representation of a Petri network
        transition - the transition that will eject tokens
        postMatrix - the matrix that links transitions to places
        postMarkings - number of tokens in each place after the update

      • transitionHasNoIncommingPlaces

        public static java.lang.Boolean transitionHasNoIncommingPlaces(PetriMap map,
                                                               Transition transition,
                                                               int[][] preMatrix)
        Checks the matrices for places that go into it.
        Parameters:
        map - object based representation of a Petri network
        transition - the transition to check
        preMatrix - the matrix that links transitions to places
        Returns:
        true if no places go IN the transition
